CONSOLE ERROR: XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://localhost:8000/xmlhttprequest/resources/access-control-basic-get-fail-non-simple.cgi. No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'http://127.0.0.1:8000' is therefore not allowed access. The response had HTTP status code 403.
PASS: Exception thrown. Cross-domain access was denied in 'send'. [Failed to execute 'send' on 'XMLHttpRequest': Failed to load 'http://localhost:8000/xmlhttprequest/resources/access-control-basic-get-fail-non-simple.cgi'.].
